definitions.definition: Having only one color, represented by differing hues and tints . For example shades in a black and white television .
Perceptive of only one color ; unable to distinguish colors; total color blindness .

main_definition: Having only one color, represented by differing hues and tints . For example shades in a black and white television .
secondary_definitions: Perceptive of only one color ; unable to distinguish colors; total color blindness .
